basics.name: Shubham Shrivastava
basics.label: Product Manager & Business Analyst
basics.summary: Product Manager and Business Analyst with 5+ years of experience in e-commerce, fintech, compliance, and platform growth. Specialized in regulatory automation, risk analytics, fraud prevention, and data-driven decision-making to optimize efficiency and reduce operational risks.

education.institution: Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya, Bhopal, India

work.summary: Leading compliance automation and risk management initiatives.
highlights: Spearheaded compliance automation, eliminating 500+ manual reporting hours annually and reducing operational costs by $450K.
Developed and deployed 5+ Power BI dashboards, enhancing risk assessment visibility and cutting significant reporting time.
Standardized business workflows using Visio, aligning compliance operations with ISO 20022.

work.summary: Managed fraud prevention models and regulatory automation solutions.
highlights: Redesigned fraud detection models, optimizing 12+ risk monitoring features, and preventing $1.2M in potential fraud losses.
Automated regulatory compliance reporting workflows using SQL & Python, cutting manual effort by 40%, saving $60K annually.

volunteer.summary: Guiding young professionals in fintech and compliance automation.
highlights: Mentored aspiring product managers and analysts in data-driven decision-making.
Conducted webinars on risk management and regulatory compliance in fintech.

awards.title: Certified Scrum Master (CSM)
awards.summary: Certified expertise in Agile methodologies and Scrum frameworks.

awards.title: Product Analytics Micro-Certification (PDC)
awards.summary: Specialized training in product analytics and data-driven decision-making.
